name: Stuntman Ragdoll Action Movie
description:
Camera, action! Have you ever wondered how it is like to be a movie stuntman? Well, now you have a chance to find out.

Get ready to visit some classic movie scenes and perform really crazy stunts. Jump, fall, explode, and take a lot of punches. Everything in the name of good old entertainment. Master every scene to perfection, untill you hear the famous: Cut! We’ve got it!

Enjoy the amazing world of cinematography from the completely new perspective. Do your best, so in the end the award for the best stuntman goes to you!
